original_text: When Isaac was eight days old, Abraham circumcised him. That is what God had told him to do.
korean_text: 그 아들 이삭이 난 지 팔 일 만에 그가 하나님이 명령하신 대로 할례를 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: When Isaac was eight days old
sentences.korean_translation: 이삭이 태어난 지 팔 일이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: That is what God had told him to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 그에게 행하라고 명하신 것이었다
